interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder,from Organic Coconut Shell and Food Grade Formula - All Natural Freshmint Flavor Tooth Whitener 30 g by Gemmaz
Review Date: 2016/02/14
Store: NUTRILUSH
Product Description: ['How To Use:', '1. Wet toothbrush.2. Dip brush into charcoal powder.3. Brush gently for 1-2 minutes, paying special attention to stained teeth.4. Rinse mouth well with water.', 'Cautions:', '-Charcoal can stain grout and fabrics. Protect counters, floors and clothing before using.- If you have crowns, caps or porcelain veneers, it’s possible that activated charcoal may stain them.- Keep out of reach of children.- Avoid contact with eyes. - Stop use if irritation Occurs.', 'Storage Conditions:', '(1)It should be stored in cool and dryplace. Pleaseavoid direct sunlight and do not expose to any high temperature.(2)Our teeth whitening powder can remove most of teeth stains from coffee, wine, tea and tobacco. But this product is not bleach. If your enamel is naturally discolored, this product will not help whiten, but is still an excellent natural daily toothpaste alternative!', 'Ingredients:', 'Activated Charcoal from Coconut, Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cellulose Microcrystalline, DendrobiumOfficinale Kimura et Migo, Resveratrol, Natural Freshmint Flavor, Stevia']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 1.1 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'NUTRILUSH'}
Review Text: These multi-colored, multi-use clips can be used for a variety of projects. This resealable bag contains 100 of the clips. The spring mechanism on the clips is of adequate strength for use in many arts and crafts applications. Having the mix of colors is useful. These are both attractive and practical, and this is a good value for this number of clips. I was provided a free sample of these for my honest, unbiased review.
Review Title: Great bag of multi-colored wonder clips for crafts
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder,from Organic Coconut Shell and Food Grade Formula - All Natural Freshmint Flavor Tooth Whitener 30 g by Gemmaz
NUTRILUSH
['How To Use:', '1. Wet toothbrush.2. Dip brush into charcoal powder.3. Brush gently for 1-2 minutes, paying special attention to stained teeth.4. Rinse mouth well with water.', 'Cautions:', '-Charcoal can stain grout and fabrics. Protect counters, floors and clothing before using.- If you have crowns, caps or porcelain veneers, it’s possible that activated charcoal may stain them.- Keep out of reach of children.- Avoid contact with eyes. - Stop use if irritation Occurs.', 'Storage Conditions:', '(1)It should be stored in cool and dryplace. Pleaseavoid direct sunlight and do not expose to any high temperature.(2)Our teeth whitening powder can remove most of teeth stains from coffee, wine, tea and tobacco. But this product is not bleach. If your enamel is naturally discolored, this product will not help whiten, but is still an excellent natural daily toothpaste alternative!', 'Ingredients:', 'Activated Charcoal from Coconut, Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cellulose Microcrystalline, DendrobiumOfficinale Kimura et Migo, Resveratrol, Natural Freshmint Flavor, Stevia']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 1.1 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'NUTRILUSH'}
These multi-colored, multi-use clips can be used for a variety of projects. This resealable bag contains 100 of the clips. The spring mechanism on the clips is of adequate strength for use in many arts and crafts applications. Having the mix of colors is useful. These are both attractive and practical, and this is a good value for this number of clips. I was provided a free sample of these for my honest, unbiased review.
Great bag of multi-colored wonder clips for crafts
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health-Conscious:** Shows a preference for natural and organic products, indicated by the selection of a charcoal teeth whitening powder made from coconut shell.
- **Aesthetic & Practical:** Enjoys colorful, versatile items for crafts, valuing both functionality and appearance.
- **Quality and Value-Oriented:** Looks for good value in purchases, evidenced by positive reviews for cost-effective items.
- **Detail-Oriented:** Cares about product usage instructions and safety cautions; appreciates clear guidelines on how to use products effectively.
- **Positive User Experience:** Tends to rate products favorably (average rating of 4.0 stars), indicating a likely trend of satisfaction with purchased items.
- **Varied Interests:** Engages in both health-related products and craft supplies, showcasing a diverse range of interests. 

This profile reflects a user who prioritizes health-conscious choices and practicality while also appreciating aesthetic appeal and value in their purchases.
